t: SAM COOKE - The Best of Sam Cooke [Vinyl] - Amazon.com Music
s: This album sounds so good. The sound is crisper and louder than some of my vinyl albums. I really enjoyed listening to every song, drinking coffee. I am reminded of some more recent artist like Luther Vandross 's (RIP)Bad Boy Having a party, while listening to Sam Cooke's Bad Boy.

t: Sam Cooke Vinyl Records — Dutch Vinyl Record Store
s: Sam Cooke (1931-1964) was an American singer, songwriter, and entrepreneur, and is considered one of the most influential figures in soul music and popular music in general. His career began as a gospel singer with the renowned Soul Stirrers, and he later branched out into pop, rhythm and blues, ...
